Name: Step 1
Description: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Name: Step 2
Description: Add the onion, and cook until tender.

Name: Step 3
Description: Stir in the Arborio rice, and cook for a few minutes, until the oil has coated each grain of rice.

Name: Step 1
Description: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Name: Step 2
Description: Add the minced garlic, and cook until fragrant.

Name: Step 3
Description: Stir in the chopped tomato, and cook until softened.

Name: Step 1
Description: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Name: Step 2
Description: Add the diced bell peppers, and cook until softened.

Name: Step 3
Description: Stir in the cumin powder, and cook for a minute, until fragrant.

Name: Step 1
Description: In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil.

Name: Step 2
Description: Add the white rice, stir, reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed.

Name: Step 1
Description: In a large bowl, combine the drained canned tuna and the cooked macaroni.

Name: Step 1
Description: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

Name: Step 2
Description: Add the diced onion, and cook until tender.

Name: Step 3
Description: Remove the skillet from the heat, stir in the crumbled feta cheese, and serve.
